title: -50kg no Cinderella
overview: Hime, who was a college student looking for a job, fell in love at first sight with Osamu, an employee at a company information session. With her single-minded desire to see him again, she succeeds in dieting and gets a job at the company. However, it is discovered that Tsukasa is the son of the company and was attracted to the pre-diet Yangme. The love of Yangme, who sways between her outward appearance and her inner self, and the unpredictable fate of their love are depicted in a series of beautiful, sweet, glittering, heart-pounding scenes. In the play, the eternal theme of women who seek beauty and health, "diet", is also described in detail. It is said that the diet method that can be practiced safely and realistically will be introduced attractively both visually and informationally.
